page.title: 09Halesworth Communications
page.content: In Halesworth there is only one Post Office,which copes well with the towns needs.There is one telephone exchange which is automatic and is situated behind the Post Office.There are 7 telephone kiosks in the town and they are placed near housing estates so they can be reached easily.There are also 11 post boxes in the surroundings of Halesworth Middle Section.In Halesworth Barclays Bank was the only bank with a Telex Service,but Midland Bank has a computer that links it up with other Midland Banks.
